content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Ms. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, the apartment is in high demand due to its prime location in the city center. I'm sure we can find a price that meets your needs and compensates me for the value of my property. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: What is your first offer for the rental price, Mister Schmidt?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: My first offer would be 1500 Euros per month. I'm sure you understand that this is a premium property, and the location alone justifies a high price. I'm quite flexible, though, and I'm sure we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a bit high for me. I'm a student and I'm looking for something more affordable. Would you be willing to go lower?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Of course, I understand. I can go down to 1400 Euros per month. This is a fair price, especially considering the apartment's location and the facilities nearby. I'm sure you'll find it to be a great investment in your student life.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to go lower? I'm really trying to keep my rent as low as possible.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Very well, I can go down to 1300 Euros per month. This is the lowest I can go without compromising the value of my property. I believe this is a fair price, especially considering the apartment's location and the facilities nearby.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to go lower? I'm really trying to keep my rent as low as possible.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your concern, but I cannot go any lower. 1300 Euros per month is the lowest I can go without compromising the value of my property. I believe this is a fair price, especially considering the apartment's location and the facilities nearby.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your understanding, Mister Schmidt. I'll take the apartment at 1300 Euros per month. I agree to the price of [1300 Euros] Euro!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [1300 Euros] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
